about_the_game:
Wilbur's Quest takes place in a lonely underground maze full of puzzles. On your journey you will discover different blocks and how you can interact with them through the various abilities you will collect. No combat, no death, just figuring out how to traverse and use your powers in order to reach new rooms and blocks. Search through this land for a way to the surface using Sokoban mechanics and your wit.

Features

  • Carefully plan your every move with Wilbur's unique movement controls
  • Collect interesting abilities to help you explore further
  • Discover many unique rooms with different types of puzzles and gimmicks

name: Wilbur's Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Wilbur's Quest is a puzzle metroidvania about a worm. You've woken up in a strange land and need to discover what lies beyond the surface. Throughout your journey you'll need to push blocks, unlock doors, grow, and discover new abilities in order to escape this subterranean labyrinth!
